name: unwieldily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is difficult to manage, usually because of being too big or badly organized : Models such as those described here tend to be large and unwieldily complex. Unwieldily long titles seem to be the norm for this genre of fiction.
More examplesFewer examplesThings can be lost in the system, and the system itself is unwieldily complicated to start with. Without this technology, trains might still be pulling themselves unwieldily along at little more than five or six miles an hour.
